public class DateSelector<P>
extends AntElement<org.apache.tools.ant.types.selectors.DateSelector,P>

Selector that chooses files based on their last modified date.

setDatetime

public DateSelector<P> setDatetime(java.lang.String val)
Sets the date. The user must supply it in MM/DD/YYYY HH:MM AM_PM format, unless an alternate pattern is specified via the pattern attribute.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.selectors.DateSelector.setDatetime)

setRefid

public DateSelector<P> setRefid(org.apache.tools.ant.types.Reference val)
Set the value of the refid attribute.

Subclasses may need to check whether any other attributes have been set as well or child elements have been created and thus override this method. if they do the must call super.setRefid.

(Doc copied from: org.apache.tools.ant.types.DataType.setRefid)
